birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市
birth_place.en: Hefei, Anhui, People's Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市浦东新区
death_place.en: Pudong, Shanghai, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委。被视为中共改革派学者型官员，其经济思想被称为“李克强经济学”。由于习近平的集权统治，他被国际媒体评价为中国近代历任总理中最弱势的一位。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP. He was considered a reform-minded, scholar-type official, and his economic philosophy is known as 'Likonomics'. Due to Xi Jinping's consolidation of power, international media regarded him as the weakest premier in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国最高领导人。在李克强担任总理期间，习近平不断集中个人权力，主导了多项重大政策。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. During Li Keqiang's premiership, Xi Jinping continuously consolidated his personal power and directed major policies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前最高领导人。他被认为是李克强的政治导师，于1983年将李克强引荐到共青团中央委员会。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He is considered Li Keqiang's political mentor, having brought him into the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，李克强的前任。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, Li Keqiang's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现任国务院总理，李克强的继任者。
description.en: The current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, Li Keqiang's successor.

description.zh-cn: 李克强的妻子，首都经济贸易大学英语教授。
description.en: Li Keqiang's wife, a professor of English at the Capital University of Economics and Business.

description.zh-cn: 李克强的父亲，曾任安徽省凤阳县县长等职务。
description.en: Li Keqiang's father, who served as the magistrate of Fengyang County, Anhui, among other positions.

description.zh-cn: 李克强的弟弟，曾任国有重点大型企业监事会主席。
description.en: Li Keqiang's younger brother, who served as the Chairman of the Board of Supervisors for Key Large State-Owned Enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学法学教授，李克强在北大学习期间的导师。
description.en: A professor of law at Peking University and Li Keqiang's mentor during his studies there.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学经济学教授，李克强的博士生导师。
description.en: A professor of economics at Peking University and Li Keqiang's doctoral advisor.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放的总设计师。李克强在卸任前夕专程到深圳莲花山向其雕像献花，并重申“长江、黄河不会倒流”，强调坚持改革开放。
description.en: The chief architect of China's Reform and Opening Up. Shortly before his retirement, Li Keqiang made a special trip to Lianhua Mountain in Shenzhen to present a flower basket to his statue, reiterating that 'the Yangtze and Yellow Rivers will not flow backward' to emphasize adherence to reform and opening up.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的首长，是中国的政府首脑。李克强于2013年至2023年担任此职务。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China, serving as the head of government. Li Keqiang held this position from 2013 to 2023.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Chinese Communist Party Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。李克强于2007年至2022年担任常委。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China. Li Keqiang was a member from 2007 to 2022.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副首长。李克强于2008年至2013年担任排名第一的副总理。
description.en: The deputy head of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Li Keqiang served as the first-ranking Vice Premier from 2008 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织。李克强曾于1993年至1998年担任其最高领导人（中央书记处第一书记）。
description.en: The youth wing of the Communist Party of China. Li Keqiang served as its top leader (First Secretary of the Central Secretariat) from 1993 to 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府，李克强的母校，他在此获得了法学学士、经济学硕士和经济学博士学位。
description.en: A top institution of higher learning in China and Li Keqiang's alma mater, where he earned his Bachelor of Laws, Master of Economics, and Doctor of Economics degrees.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在2020年提出的经济政策，旨在通过放宽对路边摊的管制来缓解因中美贸易战和新冠疫情带来的失业压力。
description.en: An economic policy proposed by Li Keqiang in 2020, aimed at alleviating unemployment pressure caused by the China-US trade war and the COVID-19 pandemic by relaxing regulations on street stalls.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会的机关报。该报曾发文批评地摊经济“不卫生、不文明”，被视为与李克强的政策相左。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China. The paper published an article criticizing the 'stall economy' as 'unhygienic and uncivilized,' which was seen as opposing Li Keqiang's policy.

description.zh-cn: 由李克强政府主持制定的旨在全面提升中国制造业水平的战略规划，目标是实现从制造大国向制造强国的转变。
description.en: A strategic plan initiated by Li Keqiang's government to comprehensively upgrade the Chinese manufacturing industry, aiming to transform the country from a manufacturing giant into a world manufacturing power.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平提出的中华人民共和国经济改革政策。李克强是该政策的坚定支持者，多次强调中国必须坚持改革开放。
description.en: The economic reform policy of the People's Republic of China initiated by Deng Xiaoping. Li Keqiang was a staunch supporter of this policy, repeatedly emphasizing that China must adhere to reform and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪90年代河南省因不规范的血浆采集导致艾滋病大规模传播的事件。该事件在李克强主政河南前后发生，他因被指控早期掩盖真相而受到批评，但后期也采取措施遏制疫情蔓延。
description.en: Refers to the large-scale spread of AIDS in Henan Province in the 1990s due to unregulated plasma collection. The event occurred around the time Li Keqiang governed Henan; he was criticized for an alleged initial cover-up but later took measures to curb the epidemic.

nodes.id: 中央应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group for Novel Coronavirus Prevention and Control

description.zh-cn: 为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情而设立的中央领导机构，由李克强担任组长。
description.en: A central leading group established to respond to the COVID-19 pandemic, headed by Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省会，李克强的出生地。
description.en: The capital of Anhui Province in the People's Republic of China, and Li Keqiang's birthplace.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，李克强的逝世地。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Li Keqiang's death.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，李克强曾在此担任省长和省委书记。
description.en: A province in the People's Republic of China where Li Keqiang served as Governor and Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，李克强曾在此担任省委书记。
description.en: A province in the People's Republic of China where Li Keqiang served as Provincial Party Secretary.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

description.zh-cn: 李克强担任两届中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang served two terms as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 李克强自中共十七届一中全会起担任三届中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Keqiang served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee for three terms, starting from the 1st Plenary Session of the 17th CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝总理任期内，李克强担任排名第一的国务院副总理。
description.en: During Premier Wen Jiabao's term, Li Keqiang served as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在党内排名上，李克强作为总理位列第二，仅次于总书记习近平。在习近平的集权下，李克强的权力被认为受到限制。
description.en: In the Party hierarchy, Premier Li Keqiang was ranked second, subordinate to General Secretary Xi Jinping. Under Xi's centralized authority, Li's power was considered to be constrained.

description.zh-cn: 外界普遍认为李克强与习近平在经济政策和治理理念上存在分歧，流传有“习李不和”的说法。李克强倡导的“地摊经济”等务实政策与习近平的政治议程时有冲突，导致其被边缘化。
description.en: It is widely believed that Li Keqiang and Xi Jinping had disagreements on economic policies and governance philosophies, leading to rumors of discord. Li's pragmatic policies, such as the 'stall economy,' often conflicted with Xi's political agenda, resulting in his marginalization.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任共青团书记的胡锦涛看中李克强并将其引荐至共青团中央委员会，并视其为门徒。
description.en: In 1983, Hu Jintao, then secretary of the Communist Youth League, recognized Li Keqiang's potential, brought him into the CYL Central Committee, and regarded him as a protégé.

description.zh-cn: 李克强接替温家宝成为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang succeeded Wen Jiabao as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替李克强成为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Li Keqiang as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

degree.zh-cn: 法学学士、经济学硕士、经济学博士
degree.en: Bachelor of Laws, Master of Economics, Doctor of Economics

description.zh-cn: 李克强于1978年考入北京大学法律系，后在职获得经济学硕博士学位。
description.en: Li Keqiang was admitted to the Law Department of Peking University in 1978 and later obtained his master's and doctoral degrees in economics while working.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在北京大学法律系学习期间，师从龚祥瑞教授。
description.en: During his studies at the Peking University Law Department, Li Keqiang was a student of Professor Gong Xiangrui.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在北京大学攻读经济学博士学位期间，师从厉以宁教授。
description.en: While pursuing his doctoral degree in economics at Peking University, Li Keqiang was supervised by Professor Li Yining.

description.zh-cn: 为应对疫情带来的就业压力，李克强公开提倡“地摊经济”，称其为“中国的生机”。
description.en: To address employment pressures caused by the pandemic, Li Keqiang publicly advocated for the 'stall economy,' calling it 'the vitality of China.'

description.zh-cn: 在李克强提倡“地摊经济”后不久，《北京日报》等官方媒体发表评论称其“不卫生、不文明”，导致该政策的热度迅速降温。
description.en: Shortly after Li Keqiang promoted the 'stall economy,' official media outlets like Beijing Daily published commentaries calling it 'unhygienic and uncivilized,' which quickly cooled enthusiasm for the policy.

description.zh-cn: 李克强主持制定了《中国制造2025》发展规划，旨在推动中国从制造大国转向制造强国。
description.en: Li Keqiang presided over the formulation of the 'Made in China 2025' development plan, aiming to promote China's transformation from a manufacturing giant to a manufacturing power.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在深圳向邓小平铜像献花，并重申改革开放的决心，此举被解读为他试图传承邓小平的政治遗产，以表达其政治立场。
description.en: Li Keqiang's gesture of presenting a flower basket to Deng Xiaoping's statue in Shenzhen and reaffirming his commitment to 'Reform and Opening Up' was interpreted as an attempt to carry on Deng's political legacy and express his own political stance.

description.zh-cn: 李克强在主政河南期间，面临处理“血祸”遗留问题的挑战。他一方面因被指控早期掩盖事件而受批评，另一方面也组织了首次省级艾滋病情普查并建立了对患者的救助机制。
description.en: During his tenure in Henan, Li Keqiang faced the challenge of dealing with the aftermath of the 'AIDS scandal.' He was criticized for an alleged early cover-up but also organized the first provincial AIDS survey and established a support mechanism for patients.

relationships.target: 中央应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 在2019冠状病毒病疫情爆发后，李克强担任中央应对疫情工作领导小组组长。
description.en: After the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic, Li Keqiang served as the head of the Central Leading Group for Novel Coronavirus Prevention and Control.
